body: This new drink takes an espresso and mixes it with brown sugar and cinnamon before being topped with oat milk.

name: Caramel Macchiato
body: Fragrant and unique classic espresso with rich caramel-peanut syrup, with cream under whipped thick foam.

name: Ice coffee
body: A popular summer drink that tones and invigorates. Prepared from coffee, milk and ice.
